name: Creaga: Create-A-Game
blurb: Make and distribute action-RPG's, choosable path adventures, visual novels, dynamic comics and more. Get creative!

rewards.reward: <ENTHUSIAST> Get early member status, 200MB of storage for projects, own up to 3 projects, get notified ahead when the project will be ready for the general public.
<BUILDER> Get early member status, 300MB of storage for projects, own up to 5 projects, beta access (phase 2).

<SUPPORTER> Get early member status, 500MB of storage for projects, own up to 7 projects. beta access (phase 1), get featured on the homepage with one of your projects for a week (once). Appear rather small on the edge of our Easter egg.

<CREATOR> Get creator status, 1024MB of storage for projects, own up to 10 projects, beta+forum access (phase 1), get featured on the homepage with one of your projects for a week (once). Appear small on the side of our Easter egg.

<GENEROUS CREATOR> Get creator status, 5GB of storage for projects, own up to 15 projects, beta+forum access (phase 1), project featured on home page for a week (x2), alpha+forum access. Appear on the side of our Easter egg.

<SPONSOR OF CREATIVITY> Get sponsor status, 10GB of storage for projects, own up to 50 projects, beta+forum access (phase 1), project featured on home page for a week (x3), alpha+forum access, item (x1). Appear on our Easter egg.

<WARRIOR OF CREATIVITY> Get sponsor status, 50GB of storage for projects, own up to 100 projects, beta+forum access (phase 1), project featured on homepage for a week (x5), alpha+forum access, item (x2), unique item (x1), credit mention, awesome signed thank-you email, dev bundle. Appear larger on our Easter egg.

<HERO OF CREATIVITY> Get VIP status, 50GB of storage for projects, own up to 100 projects, beta+forum access (phase 1), project featured on homepage for a week (x5), alpha+forum access, item (x3), unique item (x1), credit mention with URL, awesome signed thank-you email, dev bundle.
Appear large toward the center of our Easter egg.
Suggest a theme for a content pack.
Become the hero of your very own narrated short story published on Creaga.

<ADMIRAL OF THE CREATIVE FLEET> Get VIP status, 50GB of storage for projects, own up to 100 projects, beta+forum access (phase 1), project featured on homepage for a week (x5), alpha+forum access, item (x3), unique item (x1), credit mention with URL, awesome signed thank-you email, dev bundle.
Appear very large near the center of our on-site easter egg.
Suggest a theme for a content pack.
Become the hero of your very own narrated short story, published on Creaga.
Attend sprint meetings a a guest.
Meet the team in an online video chat.

<GOD OF CREATION> Get VIP status, 100GB of storage for your projects, own over 9000 projects, beta+forum access (phase 1), featured on the home page (unlimited within reason), alpha+forum access, item (x5), unique item, credit mention with URL (and banner if you like), awesome signed thank-you email, dev bundle.
Become the flamy heart of our on-site Easter egg.
Suggest up to three themes for content packs.
Become the god of your very own narrated short story, published on Creaga.
Attend sprint meetings as a guest.
Meet the team in an online video chat.
Expect a delivery of an acrylic painting done by Stefanie.
Work together with us to design one module for Creaga (must be feasible, drop us a line before you pledge).
